short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: input element and ctrl+shift on keyboard to typing and repeat ctrl+shift to stop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
እዚኣ መጽሓፊ ትግርኛ ኣብ ብራውዘር ኮይና፣ ኣብ መጽሓፊ ቦታ ምስጠወቕኩም ብትግርኛ ክትጽሕፉ ትኽእሉ። ስለዚ ክትጽሕፉ ክትደልዩ ከለኹም መጀመርያ cntrl + shift ኣብ ኪቦርድ ትጥውቑ ሞ ትግርኛ ንኽትጽሕፉ ድልውቲ ትገብርዋ ኣለኹም ማለት ኢዩ። ምጽሓፍ ብትግርኛ ምስዘይትደልዩ ድማ ነተን ctrl + shift ከምእንደገና ትጥውቁወን ማለት ኢዩ። ኣብ ሓጺር እዋን ጽሑፍ ክትትርጉም ከምትኽእል ክንገብራ ኢና።
ክትጽሕፉ ከለኹም ነዚ ዝስዕብ ተመልከቱ፡
በ ቡ ቢ ባ ቤ ብ ቦ ንምጽሓፍ be bu bi ba bie b bo
አ ኡ ኢ ኣ ኤ እ ኦ    ንምጽሓፍ  Aa Au Ai Aa Aie A Ao።

ክንጽሕፍ ከለና ብ ሻዱሻይ ፊደል ናይ ቀንዲ መራሒ ፊደል ይጅምር ብድሕሪኡ ካብቶም ቫወልስ ዘበሃሉ ምስ ሰዓብዎ ትኽክል ፊደል ይጸሓፍ።

This extension helps to type Tigrina alphabets on a browser. Just click the input element and press ctrl + shift on the keyboard to start typing and repeat ctrl + shift to stop it whenever you like to stop. It will also help to translate text to Tigrina or vice versa if text is selected and hovered but at this moment the translation functionality is not working, however it will come at the next version definitely.

In normal situation :To type "መጻኹ" then you could type in  keyboard like this "mexaKu".
When typing, it always begins with the 6th letter of any stem alphabet, however when you add vowels to it then it will switch to the intended alphabet in Tigrina.



.
